title: Spirit Awards 2025: Shōgun, Baby Reindeer and How to Die Alone Among TV Winners — View Full List
description: The 2025 Film Independent Spirit Awards — the top awards event for the independent film and television community — were handed out on Saturday from the beach in Santa Monica, Calif. The ceremony, hosted by Saturday Night Live vet Aidy Bryant for the second year in the row, was streamed live on the IMDb and Film Independent YouTube channels at 5 pm […]
author: Claire Franken
excerpt: Here are the Film Independent Spirit Awards 2025 winners — view complete list.
text: The 2025 Film Independent Spirit Awards — the top awards event for the independent film and television community — were handed out on Saturday from the beach in Santa Monica, Calif. The ceremony, hosted by Saturday Night Live vet Aidy Bryant for the second year in the row, was streamed live on the IMDb and Film Independent YouTube channels at 5 pm ET, and across other social platforms. Netflix’s Baby Reindeer walked away with three wins: Best Lead Performance for Richard Gadd, Best Supporting Performance for Nava Mau and Best Breakthrough Performance for Jessica Gunning. Meanwhile, FX’s Shōgun took home the trophy for Best New Scripted Series. Keep scrolling for a complete list of Spirit Awards TV winners and select winners in major film categories. html:
The 2025 Film Independent Spirit Awards — the top awards event for the independent film and television community — were handed out on Saturday from the beach in Santa Monica, Calif.

The ceremony, hosted by Saturday Night Live vet Aidy Bryant for the second year in the row, was streamed live on the IMDb and Film Independent YouTube channels at 5 pm ET, and across other social platforms.

Netflix’s Baby Reindeer walked away with three wins: Best Lead Performance for Richard Gadd, Best Supporting Performance for Nava Mau and Best Breakthrough Performance for Jessica Gunning. Meanwhile, FX’s Shōgun took home the trophy for Best New Scripted Series.

Keep scrolling for a complete list of Spirit Awards TV winners and select winners in major film categories.

TV CATEGORIES

BEST NEW SCRIPTED SERIES
Baby Reindeer
Diarra From Detroit
English Teacher
Fantasmas
Shōgun — WINNER

BEST LEAD PERFORMANCE
Brian Jordan Alvarez, English Teacher
Richard Gadd, Baby Reindeer — WINNER
Lily Gladstone, Under the Bridge
Kathryn Hahn, Agatha All Along
Cristin Milioti, The Penguin

Andrew Scott, Ripley
Julio Torres, Fantasmas

BEST SUPPORTING PERFORMANCE

Megan Stott, Penelope

BEST NEW NON-SCRIPTED OR DOCUMENTARY SERIES
